name: NecroBouncer
storyline:
Hey, Buddy! Grab your magic staff and find yourself in the shoes of a necromancer working as a bouncer in a nightclub. Every day he selflessly crawls the dungeon club only to do it over and over again in an endless loop of despair. You’ll face hordes of enemies who have been unleashed during your absence from the workplace. It's time to show these pathetic dogs who's in charge!

Remember the golden years when you ran home as fast as you could after school so you could play your favorite games on the computer or console until your parents got home from work? Thanks to NecroBouncer you are sure to have a lot of old-school slash and dash fun.
summary: Rogue-like dungeon crawler where you have a chance to play as a necromancer, who works as a bouncer in a dungeon club. Choose your path, try out endless builds, and go on to defeat hardcore bosses to acquire and unleash their powers on hordes of enemies!
